text: The Chamber of Deputies () is the lower house of Chile's bicameral Congress. Deputies must: be aged at least 21; not be disqualified from voting; have finished secondary school; and have lived in the corresponding electoral district for at least two years prior to the election. Since 2017, Chile's congress has been elected through open list proportional representation. ==Other websites== * Category:Government of Chile Category:Organisations based in Chile
title: Chamber of Deputies of Chile
